title: Password doesn't work?
body:
My actual account (had to make a smurf) can't log onto the game because of an incorrect password error. When I tried to change my password I found that the account is still mated with an old email that I no longer have access too, so the email verification is unobtainable. My questions are these;

Why would my password suddenly not work? The last time I logged on was during the Camille release where I purchased her as a gift for my fianc√©. 

How would I go about changing my the email associated with my actual account to the one I am currently using, considering that I don't have access to the old one. This is especially concerning since my password doesn't work anymore.

If my account has been hacked, and the password changed, how would I go about recovering it altogether without access to the prior account?

 Thank you in advance, I'd like to solve this as soon as possible.

replies.body:
We can assist you with recovering the account and changing your associated email if you reach out in a support ticket using [**this specific form.**](http://riot.com/2iGnX0K) One of our recovery specialists will reach back out to you as soon as possible after you've submitted your ticket.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Since I can't log onto the site here either, I'm assuming I was hacked.
How would I go about doing that?
Had the same problem. You just need to repatch your client and should work.
